files.menu.xml:
<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <item android:id="@+id/menu_item_upload_photo" android:title="@string/menu_upload_photo" android:icon="@drawable/ic_upload_photo"/>
    <item android:id="@+id/menu_item_edit_intro" android:title="@string/menu_edit_intro" android:icon="@drawable/ic_edit_intro"/>
    <item android:id="@+id/menu_item_set_price" android:title="@string/menu_set_price" android:icon="@drawable/ic_set_price"/>
</menu>
files.upload_photo_activity.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
    <Button android:id="@+id/button_upload_photo" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_upload_photo"/>
    <ImageView android:id="@+id/image_view_photo" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.edit_intro_activity.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
    <EditText android:id="@+id/edit_text_intro" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/edit_text_hint_intro"/>
    <Button android:id="@+id/button_edit_intro" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_edit_intro"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.set_price_activity.xml:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
    <EditText android:id="@+id/edit_text_price" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/edit_text_hint_price"/>
    <Button android:id="@+id/button_set_price" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_set_price"/>
</LinearLayout>
files.strings.xml:
<resources>
    <string name="app_name">德州餐厅</string>
    <string name="menu_upload_photo">上传照片</string>
    <string name="menu_edit_intro">编辑文字介绍</string>
    <string name="menu_set_price">设定价格</string>
    <string name="button_upload_photo">上传照片</string>
    <string name="button_edit_intro">编辑文字介绍</string>
    <string name="button_set_price">设定价格</string>
    <string name="edit_text_hint_intro">请输入文字介绍</string>
    <string name="edit_text_hint_price">请输入价格</string>
</resources>
